file.name: me_evaluator_spec.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  title: kearch meta search engine evaluator API
  description: kearch meta search engine evaluator API
  version: 0.1.0
servers:
  - url: 'http://{me_host}:{port}/me/evaluator'
    variables:
      me_host:
        default: me-evaluator.kearch.svc.cluster.local
      port:
        default: '10080'
paths:
  /evaluate:
    get:
      parameters:
        - in: query
          name: query
          schema:
            type: string
          required: true
      responses:
        '200':
          description: An info about specialist servers for a given query.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Evaluation'                  
components:
  schemas:
    Evaluation:
      type: object
      additionalProperties:
        type: number
        format: float
      example: {'192.168.99.100': 0.91}
